articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Emir of Qatar
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Emir of Qatar
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Tamim Bin Hamad Al-Thani, emir of Qatar, on the occasion of its independence.  
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished the emir greater success in the work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: International Meeting on Issue of Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula Held
articles.content:
International Meeting on Issue of Ensuring Peace on Korean Peninsula Held 
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- An international meeting on the issue of ensuring the peace on the Korean peninsula was held in Stockholm, Sweden on Dec. 15 and 16.
					Present there were officials of the Institute for Disarmament and Peace of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK and security experts of different countries and regions.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Families of those related to the revolutionary activities of the great leaders Sunday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 They also laid bunches of flowers before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.

articles.title: Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home in Mangyongdae, the members of the delegation looked round historic relics preserved with much care, being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President and the patriotic life of his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 The head of the delegation said that Mangyongdae where the President was born is our native place.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Whenever I visit Mangyongdae, I am strongly longing for Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years, liberated the country and glorified it as the country of independence.
					
					 His whole life is the one of the great revolutionary for the people's freedom and liberation.
					
					 The delegation also visited the National Gifts Exhibition House and the Hana Musical Information Centre.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Issues Schedule and Fighting Subject of 8th All-people's Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Issues Schedule and Fighting Subject of 8th All-people's Action 
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The people's emergency action to oust Park Geun Hye regime in south Korea issued the schedule and fighting subject of the 8th all-people's action to be staged at Kwanghwamun Plaza, Seoul on Dec. 17, according to the south Korean KBS. 
					 The action said that it set "day of punishing those accomplices of Park Geun Hye regime and eradicating deep-rooted evil" as the subject of the 8th all-people's action and will demand Park and Hwang Kyo An, acting "president", immediately step down.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed in Japan
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed in Japan
 Tokyo, December 17 (KNS-KCNA) -- A memorial service took place in Tokyo on Dec. 14 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Chairman Fumihiro Himori and other members of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea. Invited there was So Chung On, department director of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Fumihiro Himori said it would be unthinkable apart from the leadership of Kim Jong Il that the Korean people successfully concluded the arduous march and the forced march and brought about the June 15 era of reunification despite the U.S. and its vassal forces' moves that had become ever more undisguised to isolate and stifle the DPRK since demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 As there are Chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un and the Korean people single-mindedly united around him, the cause of HE Kim Jong Il will be successfully realized, he added.
					
					 Other speakers evinced their will to arrange events marking the 105th and the 75th birth anniversaries of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was read out at the memorial service.

articles.title: General Association of Koreans in China Supports S. Korean People's Struggle for Justice
articles.content:
General Association of Koreans in China Supports S. Korean People's Struggle for Justice
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on Dec. 14 fully supported and encouraged the do-or-die resistance of the south Korean people for justice to wipe out those forces challenging the angered public sentiment, the flame of the struggle kindled by them under the sponsorship of the emergency people's action and to create new society in which the people have become the master and new history.
					 The general association and all Koreans in China, expressing belief that the emergency people's action which calls for ousting, detaining and investigating Park Geun Hye and dissolving the "Saenuri Party" will bring victorious, said they will conduct the struggle to the last to wipe out the Park regime and realize democracy in south Korea, together with south Korean compatriots.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted on Foreign Websites
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted on Foreign Websites
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- "On Improving the Role of the UAWK in Accomplishing the Juche-Oriented Socialist Cause", the letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to those attending the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK), was posted by the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association on their websites from December 8 to 11.
					The work made public on Dec. 6, Juche 105 (2016) clarifies that the UAWK is a mass-based political organization of our socialist agricultural workers which was founded and has developed under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, and a reliable transmission belt and peripheral organization of the Party.
					
					It also indicates the tasks for the union and ways for doing so.

articles.title: Lectures Given in Various Countries
articles.content:
Lectures Given in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Venezuela, Mexico, Angola and Guinea from Nov. 25 to Dec. 6 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 A lawmaker of Venezuela said that Kim Jong Il being revered by the world is the savior of humankind who defended the socialist cause and dynamically advanced it, adding they had a firm conviction of victory of socialism as Korean socialism is steadfast.
					
					 Andres Gasca Sanchez, president of the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il, praised Kim Jong Il for turning the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power by successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Songun pioneered by Kim Il Sung and for providing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes for reunification common to the Korean nation, with his bold decision of loving the country and the nation.
